name: WWII: Brave People - Chapter 2
description:
Chapter 2 is added as a continuation of the earlier section. In this chapter you take the place of resistance fighter Fred who is arrested and forced to enlist in the German army. He does not have much choice. Will Fred manage to get out of the hands of the Nazis?

This is a Point-N-Click adventure game in a WW2 setting with many challenging and fun puzzles to solve.

Currently, there is only an Android version available.
